extendedInfo.description: Love or hate Biology?  Doesnât matter, you can have fun with Biology with the BioIQ game.  Learn Biology,Review your knowledge and have a fun too.It is easy and fun to play this picture game.  The objective of the game is to label a picture. To play, just a) Select a game you want to play by hitting the âPlayâ buttonb) Select one of 3 label choices and move it to the  appropriate part of the image. If the label matches with the part, you WIN. If you get it wrong, just try again. A new label is unlocked when you get a label right, till you complete all labels in a level.So, are you up for the challenge?Games included are:1: Plant cell (Free)Did you know that plant cell is the basic functional unit that makes up a plant eventually? A plant cell consists of numerous parts like  chloroplast, cell wall, golgi, nucleus, mitochondrion and more. Game 2 to 6 can be purchased for $1.99 only.2: Human heartDid you know that human heart starts beating on 21st day in our mothersâ womb? The fist-sized organ weighing 250-350 grams is responsible for the continuous blood circulation in the body. In this game, you can identify many parts including  left& right atriums,  left & right ventricles, aorta, pulmonary valve and more.3: FrogWhat did we study in first biology anatomy class?   was it an amphibian? Frog!!! This awesome game will remind you of those âfrogâ days. Play and identify cloaca, lungs, liver, gall bladder and more.4: Human eyeOur eyes look deceivingly simple, but it is so complex and beautiful. Did you know that  human eye can recognize over 10 million different colors! Explore different parts like  lens, cornea , sclera, choroid, iris, retina, central retinal artery & vein and more.5: Animal cellCells are smallest living biological structure.   Did you know, an adult human body is made up of 210 different cell types? Identify cilium, nucleus, nucleoplasm, perioxisomes, cytoplasm, ribosomes, lysosome and more.6: Human KidneyKidneys are vital, as they work as a filter for our blood. They are responsible for creating & excreting urine from our bodies, and balance different parameters in blood such as electrolyte level, acid base balance, & they even regulate blood pressure! In this game identify cortex, papilla, ureter, medulla, interlobar artery and other parts & learn more about kidney.7 - 11: can be purchased for $1.99 only!7: Internal Organs of the Human BodyCells make tissue, tissue makes organs and different organs together makes the human body work. Can you identify the major organs in a human body, such as the spleen, lungs, liver, gall bladder, kidney, small intestine, stomach and more.8: Human EarWe all know ears are for auditory purposes. But do you know they maintain balance and positioning of our body as well? Here you will know about the cochlea, eustachian tube, incus, tympanic membrane, and other parts of the ear.9: SkinSkin is the restless guard that is protecting our underlying structures and muscles, bones, ligaments and all the other organs. Do you know what this largest organ of our body is made of? Play this game and know instantly if your knowledge is more than skin-deep! Check out the different layers, sweat glands, sensory nerve endings, hair root, dermal papilla and more.10: SkeletonAn adult human body consists of 206 bones to be exact and this game will give you a fine opportunity to learn  human skeleton structure and its functions. Can you identify Carpals, Fermur, Sternum, Sacrum, Vertebrae and more?11: BrainHuman brain is the magic box. Nobody fully knows yet how it works and it would require studying for all through your life to know it all!. You will have to identify Cerebellum, Pons , Cerebral Cortex, Hypothalamus  and many more parts.Whether you are student, teacher, or simply interested in biology - this game is for you! Enhance your knowledge and have fun too. Play it now.

reviews.title: Weak at best
reviews.comment: This game has potential but when a piece of software wants to charge you for tiny packets of gameplay  well. .. you better run because these people are looking to use you like the town pump.  That means over and over every day ;)
reviews.author: Jim Turman

reviews.title: Free app fine,upgrade stole my$
reviews.comment: Enjoyed the first app but when I upgraded I paid for it and never received it I have sent them an email I sure hope they get back to me
reviews.author: Amy Aderhold

reviews.title: \304\260ts good
reviews.comment: My test is coming for that
reviews.author: Yatri Jani

reviews.title: cool game,  fun for all
reviews.comment: This one is cool dude!!!  super images and super idea...wish everything in Biology could be learnt this fun way!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: First level is just labeling a plant cell. Kinda cool but after that you have to pay for other levels. They should offer more levels for free so you can see if you like the game or not.
reviews.author: Ashley Booth

reviews.title: Alright app.
reviews.comment: It is a fun way to learn. Bad thing is you have to keep buying packs to move on.
reviews.author: Crystal Rivera

reviews.title: Too expensive
reviews.comment: I bought this but think they should have given more free games except just the cell.
reviews.author: Ciara Lutton

reviews.title: Good to improve
reviews.comment: Its better to see pics as microscope shows
reviews.author: Shashi Gautam

reviews.title: Purchase to play
reviews.comment: Cool graphics and great concept but its lame that you only get one free game and you need to purchase the rest
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing biological game
reviews.comment: Amazing biological game where you can easily learn parts of plant cell, animal cell, human organs, and other. Nice pictures help you to visualize all these biological stuff.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great educational tool!
reviews.comment: This app is very useful especially for students currently studying biology. Interesting game play that can greatly improve memorization of plant/animal/human parts commonly encountered in class.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its simply awesome! I find it really interesting and usefull!! Thanks su rely love that
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sensation xl
reviews.comment: Great game where you can play and learn. Actualy the best from this kind. For basic and profetional users
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: You can only play 1 level then they except you to pay for the rest of the levels
reviews.author: Jacqueline Correa

reviews.title: rubbish
reviews.comment: 1 free game.. 9 questions.. completed faster than download speed! then expected to buy the rest! haha uninstall
